message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV 

This paper proposes a method for learning universal sentence representations, which is a fundamental task in natural language processing. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The method involves training on a dataset, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper involves encoding suffixes of word sequences, which could fall under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) or cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper evaluates its approach on transfer tasks, which could also suggest a connection to cs.CV (Computer Vision).
